banner.slogan3: is an art, and your project is our
banner.description_p1: I am 23-years-old Software Development Engineer about to graduate and I am also a
banner.description_p3: passionate about all forms of virtual art creation. I would like to demonstrate through my efforts that software is not merely cold and mechanical logic; it's not just a tool, but it has the potential to become something authentically artistic, fascinating, and brimming with identity. Software is not a thing of tomorrow; it's of today
banner.description_tooltip: Where one person juggles both the front-end and back-end with the grace of a one-person band ðŸŽ¸

about_me.img_description: Editor's note: He is not me; I am the editor
about_me.paragraph2: I am a Full Stack developer based in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico. I have experience working with a variety of programming languages and technologies, including React, Laravel, Vue.js, JavaScript, PHP, CSS, SQL, among others. I am currently in my final semester of my major in Software Development Engineering at the Autonomous University of Baja California Sur, maintaining an average of 92 out of 100. Throughout the complex curriculum, I have discovered that my greatest strength is undoubtedly programming
about_me.paragraph3: I'm an ambitious and perfectionistic individual who values productivity above all else. My constant pursuit of excellence and innovation motivates me to continually enhance my skills. I dedicate numerous hours each day to my work by choice, consistently working to eliminate distractions in order to achieve my professional goals
about_me.paragraph4: I'm currently working on independent projects aimed at helping people learn to program. I'm excited to see how these projects positively impact the lives of others

skills.description1: Over the course of more than 8 years of studying programming since my high school days, I have learned to work with a diverse range of technologies. Nevertheless, I have particularly focused on honing my skills and
skills.description2: specializing in React, Laravel, and Vue.Js
skills.description3: , regarding them as my primary areas of expertise.
